Package com._360t.structured.model.template

Class MessageProcessTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com._360t.structured.model.template.MessageProcessTemplate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientSocketPublisherSubscriber, PlayerProcessor, ServerSocketPublisherSubscriber
    public abstract class MessageProcessTemplate
extends java.lang.Object

    An implementation of the template method for the message exchange process

    The main class of the program that manages the flow of messages exchanging between different classes of processor, publishers and subscribers. Of course, according to the template design pattern, it does not interfere in the messaging business and only controls the flow.

    This is an abstract class that, in addition to its main method, provides several abstract methods to its subclasses, which they implement and the order in which they are called is the responsibility of this class.

    Since:
    9/17/2020
    Author:
    MohammadReza Ahmadi

      • subscriptionStatus

        private SubscriptionStatus subscriptionStatus
        value of each publisher subscription status which extends this class. type of this field is SubscriptionStatus which has different values.

    • Method Detail

      • getCountDownLatch

        protected abstract java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch getCountDownLatch()
        Returns:
        CountDownLatch of each concrete subClass. It is used to control the number of message exchanging for each subClass.
        See Also:
        CountDownLatch

      • getSubscriberSubscription

        protected abstract SubscriptionModel getSubscriberSubscription()
        This is a concrete Subscription instance which passed to each Subscriber instance of this Publisher instance. Subscribers can send their new request to their Publisher through the methods of this class.
        Returns:
        SubscriptionModel of each subscriber
        See Also:
        SubscriptionModel

      • getMessageTransformer

        protected java.util.function.Function<MessageModel,​MessageModel> getMessageTransformer()
        Actually it a subclass of Function interface, which could be passed by setter method of each processor instance and do the message transformation. In this application there are two concrete class of the Function interface type and do the transformation for both sender and receiver player.
        Returns:
        Function instance of each processor instance.
        See Also:
        SenderMessageTransformer, ReceiverMessageTransformer

      • beforeSendMessage

        protected abstract MessageModel beforeSendMessage​(MessageModel message)
        This method is used to performing any activity before sending a message from any Publisher instance to its Subscriber instance. For example, in both ServerSocketPublisherSubscriber and ClientSocketPublisherSubscriber, this method performs reading socket streams operations.
        Parameters:
        message -
        Returns:
        See Also:
        ServerSocketPublisherSubscriber, ClientSocketPublisherSubscriber

      • sendMessage

        protected abstract void sendMessage​(MessageModel message)
        In this method message prepared by the sender player send to the receiver player through the processor classes.
        Parameters:
        message - sent message instance

      • receiveMessage

        protected abstract void receiveMessage​(MessageModel message)
        In this method message sent by the sender player will be received by the receiver player through the processor classes.
        Parameters:
        message - receiving message instance

      • afterReceiveMessage

        protected void afterReceiveMessage​(MessageModel message)
        This method is used to perform any other activity after sending the message. This method is called by the main method of the MessageProcessTemplate class in the method calling process flow.
        Parameters:
        message - received message instance

      • stopSubscriptionStatus

        protected final void stopSubscriptionStatus()
        This method is used to change the subscription status to the STOPPED status.
        See Also:
        SubscriptionStatus

      • delay

        protected abstract void delay()
        This method is used for interrupting exchanging each message for a defined milliseconds.

      • onComplete

        protected abstract void onComplete()
        This method is called when each of processor or publisher complete its exchanging based on requested message number.

      • handleReceiveMessage

        protected void handleReceiveMessage​(MessageModel message)
        This method act as a template method and handle process flow of receiving message.
        Parameters:
        message - receiving message instance

      • handleSendMessage

        protected void handleSendMessage​(MessageModel message)
        This method act as a template method and handle process flow fo sending message.
        Parameters:
        message - sent message instance

      • countDown

        public final void countDown()
        This method is called when a cycle of sending and receiving a message is completed. In fact, if the relevant processor has a CountDownLatch, the value of which is reduced by one. And if the relevant processor does not have a countDownLatch, the number of requests in its subscriberSubscription is reduced by one.

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete()
        This method return True, if the exchanging cycle of each processor is completed, if not it returns False.
        Returns:
        boolean value.

      • isNotStopped

        public boolean isNotStopped()
        This is a helper method to indicates the SubscriptionStatus of each processor.
        Returns:
        boolean value.
